title: Arthur Lord Capell Lieutenant Generall under the Prince His Highnesse of His Majesties forces, in the counties of VVorcester, Salop, and Chester, and the sixt northern counties of VVales To all commanders, officers, and souldiers, and to all other His Majesties subjects whatsoever, whom these presents shall or may in anywise concern.
author: Capel of Hadham, Arthur Capel, Baron, 1610?-1649.
publicationStmtPublisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie. And by the assignes of John Bill,
